name: Dead Shooting Pro: Z Kill
description:
Dead Shooting Pro: Z Kill is one of the best first person horror shooting action games. In this game player has to survive from all the zombie attacks while killing them one by one or in packs. You have to be a person of strong heart while killing dead zombies with merciless attitude
Features

Best 3D deadly dangerous environments.
Specially designed zombie body physic in 3D
Strong controls in FPS movements very smooth touch
Best artificial intelligence never been provided in 3D zombie
Terrific ferocious zombie sounds with a great dark themed music.
Game has three environments and sixty’s horror levels
Different feelings in different levels
